text: Microtrombidiidae is a family of micro velvet mites in the order Trombidiformes. There are about five genera and seven described species in Microtrombidiidae. ==Genera== * Ettmulleria * Eutrombidium * Holcotrombidium * Microtrombidium * Platytrombidium ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * Category:Trombidiformes
title: Microtrombidiidae
